sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager End Point Statistics
sect1.para: This page shows information about the End Point Statistics for each deployed BPEL process.

simplelist.member: To start the Statistics gathering click "Enable Statistics".
To stop the Satistics gathering click "Stop Statistics gathering".
To reset the Statistics results click "Reset Statistics". This however will not stop statistics gathering.
To view the process info page click the name of the process in the listing. This will go to a page showing the state of the process, possible actions for the process and a list of instances.

To view the properties of the Partner Link click the name of the Partner Link the listing. This will go to a separate page showing the properties for the Parner Link such as WS-Addressing, Delivery Execution, WS-Security, etc.
Click to navigate among the list of processes.
